name: Staff Pointer
description:
Be a nordic wizard and fight using elemental magic!

Cast spells by drawing runes!

May the best of 3 rounds wins!

----

Features
  • Local play
  • Fast-paced, 2-player PvP
  • Drawing / Writing attack mechanic
  • Ping-pong defense mechanic
  • Norse-themed visuals and soundscape

----

Controls

Wiimote movement - Move cursor

Wiimote B button

  • Hold: Draw
  • Release: Stop drawing

S or K - Activate shield

SFX

Most SFX are taken from Epic Stock Media free sounds pack.

Staff Pointer is a game made in a game production course at Uppsala University. Will be showcased on GGC 2022.
